input.sentences: a couple decided to be dare devils and go out on a volcano .
they were extremely scared | but they were impressed at themselves for achieving it .
once they got passed the scary part | they were able to see a beautiful area .
they had to breathe in a lot of smoke .
once they got off the volcano | they came across a sculpture .
output.sentences: As the smoke climbed out of the fissure, it was obvious that something unsettling was in the works.
The nearby lake showed some pretty scary signs as well.
But nothing bad happened and we were relieved, and it WAS a beautiful sight to behold.
The smoke kept pouring out, sometimes make it hard to breathe.
The visit to the volcanic park  was ended at the gift shop where the locals had volcanic sculptures for sale.
